00231 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00232 // Function: undo()
00233 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00234 void EndPointChangeCommand::undo() {
00235     endPoint_->getBusInterface()->setName(oldName_);
00236     endPoint_->getBusInterface()->setInterfaceMode(oldMode_);
00237         endPoint_->setDescription(oldDescription_);
00238     endPoint_->updateInterface();
00239 }

00241 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00242 // Function: redo()
00243 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00244 void EndPointChangeCommand::redo() {
00245     endPoint_->getBusInterface()->setName(newName_);
00246     endPoint_->getBusInterface()->setInterfaceMode(newMode_);
00247         endPoint_->setDescription(newDescription_);
00248     endPoint_->updateInterface();
00249 }

00251 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00252 // Function: EndPointTypesCommand()
00253 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00254 EndPointTypesCommand::EndPointTypesCommand(DiagramConnectionEndPoint* endPoint,
00255                                            VLNV const& oldBusType, VLNV const& oldAbsType,
00256                                            General::InterfaceMode oldMode,
00257                                            QString const& oldName, QUndoCommand* parent)
00258     : QUndoCommand(parent), endPoint_(endPoint), oldBusType_(oldBusType), oldAbsType_(oldAbsType),
00259       oldMode_(oldMode), oldName_(oldName), newBusType_(), newAbsType_(),
00260       newMode_(General::MASTER), newName_(""), connModes_()
00261 {
00262     if (endPoint_->getBusInterface() != 0)
00263     {
00264         newBusType_ = endPoint_->getBusInterface()->getBusType();
00265         newAbsType_ = endPoint_->getBusInterface()->getAbstractionType();
00266         newMode_ = endPoint_->getBusInterface()->getInterfaceMode();
00267         newName_ = endPoint_->getBusInterface()->getName();
00268     }
00269 
00270     // Save the interface modes for each connection.
00271     foreach (DiagramInterconnection* conn, endPoint_->getInterconnections())
00272     {
00273         DiagramConnectionEndPoint* endPoint = conn->endPoint1();
00274 
00275         if (conn->endPoint1() == endPoint_)
00276         {
00277             endPoint = conn->endPoint2();
00278         }
00279         
00280         QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf = endPoint->getBusInterface();
00281 
00282         if (busIf != 0 && busIf->getBusType().isValid())
00283         {
00284             connModes_.insert(endPoint, busIf->getInterfaceMode());
00285         }
00286     }
00287 }
00288 
00289 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00290 // Function: ~EndPointTypesCommand()
00291 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00292 EndPointTypesCommand::~EndPointTypesCommand()
00293 {
00294 }
00295 
00296 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00297 // Function: undo()
00298 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00299 void EndPointTypesCommand::undo()
00300 {
00301     endPoint_->setTypes(oldBusType_, oldAbsType_, oldMode_);
00302 
00303     if (endPoint_->getBusInterface() != 0 && oldName_ != newName_)
00304     {
00305         endPoint_->getBusInterface()->setName(oldName_);
00306     }
00307 
00308     endPoint_->updateInterface();
00309 }
00310 
00311 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00312 // Function: redo()
00313 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00314 void EndPointTypesCommand::redo()
00315 {
00316     endPoint_->setTypes(newBusType_, newAbsType_, newMode_);
00317 
00318     if (oldName_ != newName_)
00319     {
00320         endPoint_->getBusInterface()->setName(newName_);
00321     }
00322 
00323     endPoint_->updateInterface();
00324 
00325     // Set interface modes for the other end points.
00326     QMap<DiagramConnectionEndPoint*, General::InterfaceMode>::iterator cur = connModes_.begin();
00327 
00328     while (cur != connModes_.end())
00329     {
00330         cur.key()->getBusInterface()->setInterfaceMode(cur.value());
00331         cur.key()->updateInterface();
00332         ++cur;
00333     }
00334 }

00355 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00356 // Function: undo()
00357 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00358 void EndPointPortMapCommand::undo()
00359 {
00360     if (endPoint_->isHierarchical())
00361     {
00362         endPoint_->getBusInterface()->setPortMaps(oldPortMaps_);
00363         endPoint_->updateInterface();
00364     }
00365 }
00366 
00367 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00368 // Function: redo()
00369 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00370 void EndPointPortMapCommand::redo()
00371 {
00372     if (endPoint_->isHierarchical())
00373     {
00374         endPoint_->getBusInterface()->setPortMaps(newPortMaps_);
00375         endPoint_->updateInterface();
00376     }
00377 }
